name: Find any IP address or Domain Location world wide
description: Free IP Geo Location API with 100% accurate geo information of IP address or Domain name like city latitude, longitude, zipcode, state/province, country, country codes, country flag, currency, dialing code. timezone, total number of cities & states/province in country, continent code, continent name and many more details in JSON format. You can also test our API online by this IP lookup tool: https://ipworld.info/iplocator

api_methods.name: IP Location of Client or IP Location of Visitor
api_methods.description: Free IP API provides country, city, state, province, local currency, latitude and longitude, company detail, ISP lookup, language, zip code, country calling code, time zone, current time, sunset and sunrise time, moonset and moonrise time from any IPv4 and IPv6 address in REST, JSON and XML format over HTTPS.

utterances.utterance: Can you tell me the location details of the IP address 192.168.1.1?
I need to find out where the domain example.com is located.
What's the geographical information for the IP 8.8.8.8?
Could you provide the city and country for the domain google.com?
Where is the server with IP address 172.217.0.46 located?
Find the location of the domain amazon.com.
I want to know the timezone of the IP address 203.0.113.0.
Can you give me the country code for the domain facebook.com?
What is the latitude and longitude of the IP 123.45.67.89?
Please provide the state and city for the domain twitter.com.

api_methods.name: IP Location by IPv4, IPv6 IP Address

You can also test our API online by this IP lookup tool: https://ipworld.info/iplocator

parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: any IPv4 IP address you can put here

parameters.name: apikey
parameters.description: API key which you can get it free after signup here https://ipworld.info/signup
